d2_dictionary.object_name: DQL - General - VDoc Component Object Types
d2_dictionary.title: Provides a list of localized object type labels that can be used to restrict the scope of object types permitted in a Virtual Document Template Spreadsheet.
d2_dictionary.application_names: OpenText Life Sciences eTMF Solution¬OpenText Life Sciences Medical Device for Research and Development Solution¬OpenText Life Sciences Medical Device Solution¬OpenText Life Sciences Quality and Manufacturing Solution¬OpenText Life Sciences Research and Development Solution¬OpenText Life Sciences Submission Storage and Viewing¬OpenText Life Sciences Medical Device for Quality and Manufacturing Solution
d2_dictionary.dql: select d1.dictionary_key as name, d1.locale_value as label_en from dm_dbo.d2_dictionary_locale_view d1, dm_dbo.d2_dictionary_alias_view d2 where d1.dictionary_name = 'Object Type Mapping' and d2.dictionary_name = d1.dictionary_name and d2.dictionary_key = d1.dictionary_key and d2.alias_name = 'Allowed in VDoc Templates' and d2.alias_value = 'Y' and ('$value(vdoc_is_study_related)' = 'F' or ('$value(domain)' = 'Clinical' and d1.dictionary_key = 'cd_clinical') or ('$value(domain)' = 'Non-Clinical' and d1.dictionary_name = 'cd_non_clinical')) and d1.locale_name = 'en' order by 2
